name: P18
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at dusk. Fading natural light mixed with activated porch lights, long shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with deliberate slow pace. They pause at the garage door, try the handle, then continue around the house. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Transitional lighting quality, warm tones, automatic exposure adjusting. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
